title: Girl on a Mission
description: It should have been the perfect summer for thirteen year old Emery Craig. She was going to get away from her high school drama, the shadow of her perfect older sister, and spend the summer with her best friend on a mission trip.But when do things ever go as planned?Stuck in West Virginia with uncomfortable air mattresses, community showers, and questionable cafeteria food, Emery wonders if she made a mistake. She is assigned to help the Suiter family’s house, and Emery quickly realizes it’s not only their house that is broken. With the help of quiet and attractive fellow student, Jesse, Emery finds herself closer than ever to the family, realizing just how powerful God can be at healing wounds.
author: Cindy Ellis
